TranslationRow.transunitsource: Hooray, you"re here! The day just got better - enjoy the following tips!
TranslationRow.transunittarget: Hurra, du bist hier! Der Tag ist gerettet - nutze die folgenden Tipps!

TranslationRow.transunitsource: A section of text like this is known as a text segment. Start rockin" your translations now!
TranslationRow.transunittarget: Eine Textpassage wie diese bezeichnen wir als Textsegment. Starte jetzt mit deinen Übersetzungen durch!

TranslationRow.transunitsource: Arriba, Arriba! Andale, Andale! Be fast as Speedy Gonzales. Just hit TAB to save and go to the next text segment, once you"re done.
TranslationRow.transunittarget: Arriba, Arriba! Andale, Andale! Sei schneller als Speedy Gonzales. Springe mit TAB ins nächste Textsegment, sobald du fertig bist. Deine Änderungen werden automatisch gespeichert.

TranslationRow.transunitsource: Houston, we have no problem. Keep track of the progress of your translations by statuses at any time.
Keep your fingers off the mouse. Master your keyboard: Change the status by using one of the shortcut keys: e.g. CTRL+K = Translated. You can see other shortcuts by pressing CTRL+H!

Dear developers, you are the masters of translation files. Add comments in a file (depends on file format) to provide translators with more information. They are imported as a description, visible in the side panel.

Dear developers, you are the masters of translation files. Add comments in a file (depends on file format) to provide translators with more information. They are imported as a description, visible in the side panel.
